languages.text: {n}Электрожрецы срывают руки с командных панелей, раздирая о пробившие их колья. Пока тела их, контролируемые схизматикалями, наполняются сиянием Движущей силы, несчастным остается лишь в ужасе кричать и молить о скорой смерти. Заря начинает бормотать нечестивую литанию на исковерканном готике.{/n}

{n}The Electro-Priests rip their hands off the command panels, rending their flesh on the stakes that pierced them. As their schismatical-controlled bodies are imbued with the Motive Force's radiance, all the unfortunates can do is scream in horror and plead for a swift death. Aurora begins muttering an unholy litany in broken Gothic.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Электрожрецы срывают руки с командных панелей, раздирая о пробившие их колья. Пока тела их, контролируемые схизматикалями, наполняются сиянием Движущей силы, несчастным остается лишь в ужасе кричать и молить о скорой смерти. Заря начинает бормотать нечестивую литанию на исковерканном готике.{/n}

As their schismatical-controlled bodies are imbued with the Motive Force's radiance, all the unfortunates can do is cry out in horror and plead for a swift death. Aurora starts to recite an unholy litany in broken Gothic.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Elektropriester reißen ihre Hände von den Bedienfeldern, schlitzen sich das Fleisch an den Pfählen auf, mit denen sie durchbohrt wurden. Als das Strahlen der Antriebskraft ihre von den Abtrünnigen kontrollierten Körper durchströmt, können die armen Seelen nur entsetzt schreien und um einen baldigen Tod betteln. Aurora beginnt eine unheilige Litanei in gebrochenem Gotisch zu murmeln.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Electro-Priests rip their hands off the command panels, rending their flesh on the stakes that pierced them. As their schismatical-controlled bodies are imbued with the Motive Force's radiance, all the unfortunates can do is scream in horror and plead for a swift death. Aurora begins muttering an unholy litany in broken Gothic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Elektropriester reißen ihre Hände von den Bedienfeldern, schlitzen sich das Fleisch an den Pfählen auf, mit denen sie durchbohrt wurden. Als das Strahlen der Antriebskraft ihre von den Abtrünnigen kontrollierten Körper durchströmt, können die armen Seelen nur entsetzt schreien und um einen baldigen Tod betteln. Aurora beginnt eine unheilige Litanei in gebrochenem Gotisch zu murmeln.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les électro-prêtres s'arrachent les mains des panneaux de commandes, déchirant leurs chairs sur les pieux qui les transperçaient. Alors que leurs corps, contrôlés schismatiquement, s'imprègnent de l'éclat de la Force Motrice, la seule chose que les malheureux peuvent faire, c'est hurler d'horreur et prier pour une mort rapide. Aurore se met à marmonner une litanie impie en gothique haché.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Electro-Priests rip their hands off the command panels, rending their flesh on the stakes that pierced them. As their schismatical-controlled bodies are imbued with the Motive Force's radiance, all the unfortunates can do is scream in horror and plead for a swift death. Aurora begins muttering an unholy litany in broken Gothic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les électroprêtres s'arrachent les mains des panneaux de commandes, déchirant leurs chairs sur les pieux qui les transperçaient. Alors que leurs corps, contrôlés schismatiquement, s'imprègnent de l'éclat de la Force Motrice, la seule chose que les malheureux peuvent faire, c'est hurler d'horreur et prier pour une mort rapide. Aurore se met à marmonner une litanie impie en gothique haché.{/n}

languages.text: {n}电僧把他们的手从控制面板上扯了下来，一部分肉体被钢桩撕裂。这些不幸之人的身体受到了分离者的控制，他们唯一能做的事情就只有惊恐尖叫，渴望能求得个痛快。“极光”以支离破碎的哥特语，喃喃念起了邪恶的祷文。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Electro-Priests rip their hands off the command panels, rending their flesh on the stakes that pierced them. As their schismatical-controlled bodies are imbued with the Motive Force's radiance, all the unfortunates can do is scream in horror and plead for a swift death. Aurora begins muttering an unholy litany in broken Gothic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}驭电祭司把他们的手从控制面板上扯了下来，一部分肉体被钢桩撕裂。这些不幸之人的身体受到了分离者的控制，他们唯一能做的事情就只有惊恐尖叫，渴望能求得个痛快。“极光”以支离破碎的哥特语，喃喃念起了邪恶的祷文。{/n}

languages.text: {n}エレクトロ・プリースト達がコマンドパネルから手を引きはがすと、体に突き刺さされていた杭で肉体が引き裂かれた。分離派にコントロールされた彼らの体には動力の輝きが宿っている。哀れな者達は恐怖で叫び、今すぐ殺してくれと懇願するしかできない。オーロラはメチャクチャな帝国語で、不浄の連祷をつぶやき始める。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Electro-Priests rip their hands off the command panels, rending their flesh on the stakes that pierced them. As their schismatical-controlled bodies are imbued with the Motive Force's radiance, all the unfortunates can do is scream in horror and plead for a swift death. Aurora begins muttering an unholy litany in broken Gothic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}エレクトロ・プリースト達はコマンドパネルから手を引きはがし、体を突き刺さす杭で肉は引き裂かれた。分裂にコントロールされた彼らの体には動力の輝きが宿っていて、その可哀想な者達は恐怖で叫び、今すぐ殺してくれと懇願するしかできない。オーロラはメチャクチャな帝国語で、不浄の連祷をつぶやき始める。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los Electrosacerdotes se arrancan las manos de los paneles de mando, desgarrándose la carne en las estacas que los atraviesan. A medida que sus cuerpos, controlados por el cisma, se impregnan del resplandor de la Fuerza Motriz, lo único que pueden hacer los desdichados es gritar de horror y suplicar una muerte rápida. Aurora comienza a murmurar una letanía impía en gótico roto.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Electro-Priests rip their hands off the command panels, rending their flesh on the stakes that pierced them. As their schismatical-controlled bodies are imbued with the Motive Force's radiance, all the unfortunates can do is scream in horror and plead for a swift death. Aurora begins muttering an unholy litany in broken Gothic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los Electrosacerdotes se arrancan las manos de los paneles de mando, desgarrándose la carne en las estacas que los atraviesan. A medida que sus cuerpos, controlados por el cisma, se impregnan del resplandor de la Fuerza Motriz, lo único que pueden hacer los desdichados es gritar de horror y suplicar una muerte rápida. Aurora comienza a murmurar una letanía impía en gótico roto.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Elektro Rahipler, ellerini komuta panelinden koparırcasına ayırıyor. Ellerini delip geçen kazıklar, etlerini parçalıyor. Bölücülerin hâkimiyetindeki bedenleri Devinim Gücü'nün parıltısıyla dolarken zavallıların yapabildiği tek şey, dehşet içinde çığlık atıp hızlı bir ölüm dilenmek oluyor. Aurora, çat pat Gotik lisanıyla habis bir dua mırıldanmaya başlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Electro-Priests rip their hands off the command panels, rending their flesh on the stakes that pierced them. As their schismatical-controlled bodies are imbued with the Motive Force's radiance, all the unfortunates can do is scream in horror and plead for a swift death. Aurora begins muttering an unholy litany in broken Gothic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Elektro Rahipler, ellerini komuta panelinden koparırcasına ayırıyor. Ellerini delip geçen kazıklar, etlerini parçalıyor. Bölücüler tarafından kontrol edilen bedenlerine Devinim Gücü'nün aydınlığı bahşediliyor. Zavallılar o an dehşet içinde çığlık atıp hızlı bir ölüm için yakarıyorlar. Aurora, çat pat Gotik bilgisini kullanarak habis bir ayin mırıldanmaya başlıyor.{/n}
